name: Adove and Bello
description:
Made for the 2022 Epic Megajam.

-Play as Bello the cat, go to the Knight Owls' nests in order to retrieve King Adoves's eggs. 

-This is a top-down view Dungeon Crawler RPG game, where you can shoot, do platforming, and take part in missions to take back King Adoves's eggs.
